column4: Boeing talks not considering change of control at Embraer -paper
column5: SAO PAULO  Jan 2 Tie-up talks between Boeing Co and Embraer SA do not contemplate a change of control at the Brazilian planemaker and are focused on joint ventures and joint business agreements  a Brazilian newspaper reported on Tuesday.

column4: BP sets $1.5 billion charge for U.S tax changes but sees long-term boost
column5: LONDON Oil giant BP  will take a one-off $1.5 billion charge to adjust to new U.S. tax rules  but expects a long-term boost from the corporate-friendly tax rates  it said on Tuesday.
